Â¶
TYPE SML_Ramptype :
The possible velocity ramp types for motion profiles.
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
SML_RT_Trapez
0
Trapezoidal velocity ramp
SML_RT_Sin2
1
sin^2 velocity ramp
